title: National Lottery Set for Life player bags £10,000 every month for 30 years

A lucky punter has won £10,000 every month for 30 years after winning the latest Set for Life contest.

The National Lottery player matched five lucky numbers and the Life Ball to become the ninth person to win the top prize on the new game.

The numbers are 4, 12, 17, 28, 36 and the life ball is 7.

Andy Carter, Senior Winners’ Advisor at The National Lottery, said, “Tonight’s win is fabulous news for Set For Life players as we have another winner tonight! This means we’re celebrating our ninth Set For Life top prize winner.

“All players are urged to check their tickets so the lucky winner can start working through their bucket list dreams as soon as possible. And don’t forget, every time you play any National Lottery game, you help raise around £30M a week for Good Causes.”

Are you the winner? Contact webnews@trinitymirror.com

(Image: Daily Mirror)

Someone else bagged £10,000 every month for one year while 40 people won a single sum of £250 in tonight's game.

Thousands of others celebrated smaller successes.

Set for Life is played on Mondays and Thursdays.
description: The National Lottery ticketholder has become the ninth person to win the top prize on the new Set for Life game
